name: Space Wrath
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 24 with the theme in mind Space and only mouse input

Use mouse to move the spaceship and don't let the bad robots go free.

Whats New:

  • Auto fire added
  • Background music added
  • New indicators for the enemy and player if they take damage
  • New sound effects
  • Some bugs fixed
  • Exports for windows and android coming soon
  • Source code coming soon for $1.00

Hope you enjoy it
